name: radioactively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves powerful and dangerous energy that comes from the breaking up of atoms: radioactively contaminated The dump could be used to bury radioactively contaminated waste, such as protective clothing from nuclear plants. Biochemists use radioactively labelled chemicals to monitor chemical reactions.
often humorous in a way that is considered to be very dangerous or harmful: This cheese is so radioactively smelly that it is banned on public transport in France. My doctor removed a cyst that was full of radioactively green pus.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is an unstable form of a chemical element that radioactively decays, resulting in the emission of nuclear radiation.Critics say the two complexes are among the most radioactively contaminated sites in the world. The procedure involves the injection of a radioactively tagged substance.
